item.title: 观看直播：ABC 新闻直播间提供当天的头条新闻和最新报道，现在即可观看。
item.description:
WATCH LIVE: ABC News Live has the day's top stories and up-to-the-minute reports, streaming now. https://t.co/uDHq2eKaAl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: "再来一次，你身上就会有洞了。"这段戏剧性的视频显示，在犹他州，滑雪板运动员被业主用枪指着拦住，指责他擅闯民宅，可以听到他一边从持枪男子身边走过，一边为误以为该地区是公共用地而道歉。
item.description:
“Do it again, there’ll be holes in you.”

Dramatic video shows snowboarder stopped at gunpoint by property owner accusing him of trespassing in Utah.

He can be heard apologizing for mistaking the area for public land as he walked away from the armed man. https://t.co/EAhrTWPhaW pic.twitter.com/7BjdL18SI7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 监控录像记录了威斯康星州沃基沙市一辆服务车闯红灯并撞上一辆满载儿童的校车的瞬间。
item.description:
Dashcam footage captured the moment a service truck ran a red light and crashed into a school bus full of children in Waukesha, Wisconsin.

Eight students were injured, and one was taken to the hospital for evaluation. https://t.co/EAhrTWPP0u pic.twitter.com/O51bErlQYU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国当局周四晚间表示，一名美国海军陆战队员的父亲于2021年美国撤出阿富汗时在阿富汗喀布尔机场遇害，他因扰乱国情咨文演讲而被美国国会警察逮捕。
item.description:
The father of a U.S. Marine who was killed at Afghanistan's Kabul airport in 2021 as America pulled out of the country was arrested by U.S. Capitol Police officers for disrupting the State of the Union address, authorities said Thursday night. https://t.co/fvUHw9fylD pic.twitter.com/fiSQNaWNVR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 以下是从拜登火热的国情咨文中得出的七点启示。
item.description:
Here are seven takeaways from Biden's fiery State of the Union. https://t.co/IPWjdPGAhE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在这一天：十年前，马来西亚航空公司一架载有 239 人的波音 777 型飞机 MH370 消失了：
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: Ten years ago, Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370, a Boeing 777 with 239 people on board, vanished.

Read more: https://t.co/5TT0yADQpk pic.twitter.com/MzlmYhG2iP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: "这是一场公平的踩踏事件。"与此同时，在澳大利亚，一场高尔夫球赛被数百只袋鼠打断。
item.description:
"It is a fair dinkum stampede."

Meanwhile in Australia, a game of golf was interrupted by hundreds of kangaroos. https://t.co/H26TVoE7xI pic.twitter.com/NcLKXHZ7gC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统宣布第一夫人吉尔-拜登（Jill Biden）将发起白宫首个妇女健康研究倡议。"妇女占我们人口的一半以上，但有关妇女健康的研究一直资金不足。
item.description:
Pres. Biden announces that First Lady Jill Biden will launch the first White House initiative on women’s health research.

“Women are more than half our population, but research on women’s health has always been underfunded.”https://t.co/Um9Jc61QH7 pic.twitter.com/cL4vsfo79r

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 泄露的内部文件显示，中国的黑客产业规模庞大，范围广泛，但也存在不正当的商业行为、对薪酬和工作质量的不满以及安全协议不完善等问题。
item.description:
China’s hacking industry, leaked internal documents reveal, is vast in size and scope but also suffers from shady business practices, disgruntlement over pay and work quality, and poor security protocols. https://t.co/YHOb9LjvEX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 梅琳达-盖茨告诉 @ABC 新闻的詹妮弗-阿什顿（Jennifer Ashton）博士，利用人工智能为妇女，尤其是农村和低收入地区的妇女提供孕产妇保健服务，可以 "改变游戏规则"，挽救孕妇的生命。
item.description:
Using artificial intelligence to provide maternal health care to women, especially those in rural and low-income areas, could be a "game-changer" in saving the lives of pregnant women, Melinda Gates told @ABC News' Dr. Jennifer Ashton. https://t.co/GDA5c4H7VF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 西南航空正在以全新的面貌登机，重新设计的客舱拥有更大的行李箱空间、设备支架、电源插座和高级飞机座椅--但旅客们在注意到一个潜在的缺陷后，很快就对升级提出了批评。
item.description:
Southwest is onboarding a brand new look with re-designed cabins featuring larger bin space, device holders, power outlets, and premium aircraft seats — but travelers were quick to criticize the upgrades after noticing a potential flaw. https://t.co/3dtMtST2eW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 科学家将在几个动物园观察日全食期间动物的作息时间是如何被打乱的。
item.description:
Scientists will observe how animals' routines at several zoos are disrupted during a total solar eclipse. https://t.co/c7ZXgrEW5e

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在周四晚发表的国情咨文中呼吁立法者 "再次达成一致，为老年人挺身而出"，同时呼吁保护社会保障。
item.description:
Pres. Biden urged lawmakers to "all agree once again to stand up for seniors" while calling for Social Security protections in his State of the Union address Thursday night.https://t.co/JBkxsO6tEa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 鸟山明工作室周五表示，畅销动漫《龙珠》和其他流行动漫的创作者、影响了日本漫画界的鸟山明已经去世。鸟山明享年 68 岁。
item.description:
Akira Toriyama, the creator of the best-selling Dragon Ball and other popular anime who influenced Japanese comics, has died, his studio said Friday. He was 68. https://t.co/oj438WGhmv

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 参议院通过了《辐照补偿法案》的重新授权。该法案将为一些州受到奥本海默时期核试验核沉降物影响的家庭提供新的或持续的资金。
item.description:
The Senate passed reauthorization of the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act.

The legislation would provide new or continued funds to families in a number of states exposed to the nuclear fallout from Oppenheimer-era nuclear testing. https://t.co/lR3jJcBHQa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州参议员凯蒂-布里特（Katie Britt）在周四晚对乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统的国情咨文发表了共和党的回应，回应了拜登对其政党的攻击和对其政绩的吹嘘，描绘了在拜登领导下的国家的一幅更加黑暗的图景。
item.description:
Alabama Sen. Katie Britt gave the Republican response to President Joe Biden's State of the Union on Thursday night, responding to his attacks on her party and boasts about his record by painting a much darker picture of the country under his leadership.https://t.co/DP8JV0CaYX

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 西南航空正在推出全新的面貌，重新设计的客舱拥有更大的垃圾箱空间、设备支架、电源插座和高级飞机座椅。
item.description:
Southwest is launching a brand new look, with re-designed cabins featuring larger bin space, device holders, power outlets, and premium aircraft seats.

But despite the enhancements, travelers were quick to criticize after noticing one potential flaw. https://t.co/MjrUwRGRix

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 周四晚，乔-拜登总统在众议院发表了他的第三次国情咨文演讲，提出了从富人税收到抵押贷款减免和堕胎权利等一系列重要建议。
item.description:
President Joe Biden delivered his third State of the Union address in the House chamber Thursday night, making a number of key proposals, from taxes for the wealthy to mortgage relief and abortion rights.https://t.co/2pRITpr3Ms

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在 #SOTU2024 期间讨论移民问题时被众议员马乔里.泰勒.格林打断，拜登回应说 "我对拉肯.莱利的父母表示同情"，并呼吁通过他的两党移民法案。
item.description:
Pres. Biden was interrupted by Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene as he discussed immigration during #SOTU2024, with Biden responding by saying "my heart goes out to" the parents of Laken Riley and calling for passage of his bipartisan immigration bill. https://t.co/exdukN7RSD pic.twitter.com/YRPbSE0NMm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国当局周四晚间表示，一名美国海军陆战队员的父亲于2021年美国撤出阿富汗时在阿富汗喀布尔机场遇害，他因扰乱国情咨文演讲而被美国国会警察逮捕。
item.description:
The father of a U.S. Marine who was killed at Afghanistan's Kabul airport in 2021 as America pulled out of the country was arrested by U.S. Capitol Police officers for disrupting the State of the Union address, authorities said Thursday night. https://t.co/MJloZt6Jxc pic.twitter.com/zLAb4gmE1k

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在拜登总统周四晚的国情咨文演讲中，民主党妇女核心小组身着白色服装，向 "为生殖权利而战 "致敬。
item.description:
The Democratic Women's Caucus wore white to honor the "fight for reproductive rights" at Pres. Biden's Thursday night State of the Union address.https://t.co/nkC6xKWOk1 pic.twitter.com/pzPkrt2p3x

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国当局周四晚间表示，一名美国海军陆战队员的父亲于2021年美国撤出阿富汗时在阿富汗喀布尔机场遇害，他因扰乱国情咨文演讲而被美国国会警察逮捕。
item.description:
The father of a U.S. Marine who was killed at Afghanistan's Kabul airport in 2021 as America pulled out of the country was arrested by U.S. Capitol Police officers for disrupting the State of the Union address, authorities said Thursday night. https://t.co/xDcI7g5jI4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在周四晚的国情咨文演讲中，乔-拜登总统宣布了一项 "紧急 "军事任务，即在加沙沿岸的地中海建造一个港口，以运送人道主义援助物资。
item.description:
During his State of the Union speech on Thursday night, President Joe Biden announced an "emergency" military mission to construct a port in the Mediterranean Sea on Gaza's coast to get humanitarian aid in.https://t.co/eYYMg4UjqK pic.twitter.com/81xRiUQTgR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在拜登总统的 #SOTU2024 讲话中因大喊大叫而被赶出众议院的男子已被证实是一名海军陆战队员的父亲，这名陆战队员在 2021 年美国撤军期间死于阿富汗喀布尔机场阿比门爆炸事件。
item.description:
The man removed from the House chamber for shouting during Pres Biden's #SOTU2024 is confirmed to be the father of a Marine who was killed in the Abbey Gate bombing at the airport in Kabul, Afghanistan, during the U.S. withdrawal in 2021. https://t.co/A1tsqCmScH pic.twitter.com/KCPNBiR1PA

— ABC News Live (@ABCNewsLive) March 8, 2024

item.title: 英格兰东南部一名 2 岁男孩的父亲分享了一段儿子举重时为他加油的视频，该视频在社交媒体上走红。
item.description:
A 2-year-old boy in southeast England has gone viral on social media after his father shared a video of his son cheering him on as he lifted weights.https://t.co/aIFhUTAxX0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在拜登发言的最后阶段，一名男子在反复大声喊叫后被带离了众议院会议厅的上层区域。这名男子似乎在大喊美国 2021 年撤军期间在喀布尔阿比门爆炸案中丧生的海军陆战队员。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Late into Biden's remarks, a man was removed from the upper area of the House chamber after shouting out repeatedly.

The man appeared to be yelling about the Marines killed in the Abbey Gate bombing in Kabul during the U.S. withdrawal in 2021. https://t.co/L0viTioGar #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/48ShnlGxVA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登发言到很晚的时候，一名男子在反复喊叫后被带离了众议院会议厅的上层区域。这名男子似乎在大喊2021年在阿富汗喀布尔机场阿比门爆炸案中丧生的海军陆战队员的名字。
item.description:
Late into Biden's remarks, a man was removed from the upper area of the House chamber after shouting out repeatedly.

The man appeared to be yelling about the Marines who were killed in the Abbey Gate bombing at the airport in Kabul, Afghanistan in 2021.https://t.co/L0qN9ojBhp

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在美国共和党的回应中，参议员凯蒂-布里特（Katie Britt）说，拜登总统的国情咨文是 "一个长期政客的表现，他在位的时间实际上比我在世的时间还长"，"拜登总统就是不明白这一点。他与时代脱节了
item.description:
During the GOP response, Sen. Katie Britt says Pres. Biden’s State of the Union was the “performance of a permanent politician, who has actually been in office for longer than I’ve been alive.”

"Pres. Biden just doesn't get it. He's out of touch." https://t.co/ocMhOjhBIu pic.twitter.com/scquw4rTJj

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在国情咨文演讲的最后谈到了他对未来的乐观态度：我看到了一个我们捍卫民主的未来......"。我看到的未来是我们恢复选择权，保护我们的自由，而不是剥夺自由"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden closes his State of the Union address by speaking on his optimism for the future: "I see a future where we are defending democracy ... I see a future where we restore the right to choose and protect our freedoms, not take them away."https://t.co/Cny6OKMN63 pic.twitter.com/Y3E8WiOIGe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统最后谈到了他对美国未来的展望。"他说："最重要的是，我看到了所有美国人的未来。"我看到了一个属于所有美国人的国家。 #SOTU2024
item.description:
Pres. Biden closed out his address, speaking to the future he envisions in America. "Above all, I see a future for all Americans," he said. "I see a country for all Americans." https://t.co/xEtuF3lbbY #SOTU2024 pic.twitter.com/zvMgRgIeqh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024
